name: Cactus Creative Ltd.
description:
Cactus Creative are a creative agency based in the North West on the edge of the English Lake District. A dynamic team of 8, with collective experience drawn from internationally renowned agencies. We are specialists in branding, design & advertising, illustration, web, art direction, video editing & post production.

The studio is based in Kendal within a local post industrial space – The Factory – an independent, creative hub which is home to other talented creatives and artists.
READ MORE...

locations.address: The Factory, Castle Mills, Aynam Road
